name: ramble
others_no_arg: $n rambles on about a boring exploit.
actor_found_target: You ramble on to $N about your past adventures.
others_found: $n blithers on and on to $N about something.
target_found: $n tells you a rather boring tale, you feign interest.
others_auto: $n begins rambling on to himself about something.  You aren't interested enough to find out what.
